```
# Virtual Environment
venv/
*.env
.venv/

# Python cache files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# API Keys and Sensitive Credentials
keys/*.docx
keys/*.json
*.key
*.pem

# IDE and Editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs
*.log

# Streamlit specific
.streamlit/secrets.toml

# Jupyter Notebooks
.ipynb_checkpoints/
```
